General.Name: Hill & Smith Holdings PLC
General.Description: Hill & Smith Holdings PLC designs, manufactures, and supplies infrastructure products; and provides galvanizing services. The company operates in three segments: Infrastructure Products ? Utilities; Infrastructure Products - Roads; and Galvanizing Services segments. The Infrastructure Products ? Utilities segment provides industrial floorings, plastic drainage pipes, security fencing, industrial platforms and flooring, glass reinforced composite railway platforms, flood prevention barriers, plastic drainage pipes, energy grid components, pipe supports, and steel and composite products for a range of infrastructure markets, including energy creation and distribution, rail, water, and house building. The Infrastructure Products - Roads segment designs, manufactures, and installs temporary and permanent safety products for the roads market together with intelligent transport systems, which provide information to road users. This segment also offers road safety barriers, variable message signs, traffic data collection systems, car parking solutions, street lighting columns, street furniture, and bridge parapets. The Galvanizing Services segment provides zinc and other coatings for a range of applications, including fencing, lighting columns, structural steel works, bridges, electricity substations, and other products for the agricultural, recreational, infrastructure, and construction markets. The company offers its products and services in the United Kingdom and rest of Europe; North America; the Middle East; Asia; and rest of world. Hill & Smith Holdings PLC was founded in 1960 and is based in Solihull, the United Kingdom.
